website_summaries.verdict: This bag uses activated carbon technology, which traps odors inside the bag and neutralizes them.
pros: Made with activated carbon technology to trap odors inside and neutralize
cons: Hook-and-loop closure is so strong that you may damage the bag trying to open it

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a cruise and I did not encounter any problems. Also made it through the airport. I had gummies and vape oil.
customer_reviews.author: TNP

customer_reviews.title: Nice lil bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice lil bag. However not 100% smell proof. If you squeeze the bag and air escapes...so does the smell. But other then tgat no smell what so ever. The bigget disappointment is that when you leave something in the bag, when you take it out a layer of black residue is left behind on whatever was put it there. I take it its the carbon. Other then that its a good bag.
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: Biker must
customer_reviews.text: If your someone that carries some stinky bud and are worried that every time you open your saddle bag it smells like a dispensary. This is my new road trip must have! In This bag I have a pipe in a case, grinder/holder, and two small containers. So for being the size it is it holds a lot. I like the discrete look don't want anything covered in pot leafs that draws attention.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It was a good bag for a little while but I give it ...
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the bag ripped after a few months of use. I feel that the Velcro is too strong which causes bag to rip defeating the purpose. It was a good bag for a little while but I give it a poor review because I contacted the company and got no response. At least respond back!
customer_reviews.author: Dotti M.

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 more and gave them to loved ones. Fits an ounce of your finest herbs ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable, well made, discreet and very smell proof. I bought 3 more and gave them to loved ones. Fits an ounce of your finest herbs no problem. Definitely worth the price, esp if it keeps you out of trouble...
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Biswell

customer_reviews.title: Holds smell inside bag, very secure closure
customer_reviews.text: Holds smell inside bag. The velcro has a tight hold. There are two velcro strips. YOu open one and flip the top open, then there is another velcro strip to open the bag. Thick layer of carbon that cannot escape onto your stuff. Big enough to put in several loose Gonesh incense sticks at a diagonal. The incense stick has a strong smell unlit. I could not smeel it from the outside of the bag. Very well constructed. I believe it will be durable. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: FaerylochTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: Smell proof enough if the product is already packaged in at least a zip lock bag, a dog might still be able to find it but it works well enough that you should be able to avoid them calling for a dog if there aren't any other factors, could fit up to an average ounce of normal products, any more than that would be crushed if the bag is closed.
customer_reviews.author: funkybart

customer_reviews.title: No stink
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised this pouch has plenty of room. Seams and handles could have better stitching
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: smell doesn't diffuse thru the material at all so the product delivered. the ends are starting to fray a little bit due to overuse but if u are careful with it/not aggressively ripping the velcro on/off then i think it will last for a bit longer. i've had this for about ~3 years now and it's been good to me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skunk bag actually works
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised, pretty much smell proof. The double velcro closures keep equipment secure and keep the smell on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have travelled with this bag internationally and can tell you it is absolutely amazing! I highly recommend this product to anyone needing a little privacy en route. The entire line is killer!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zach W

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I took this on my carry on bag recently to Italy. It went completely undetected. Sadly I lost it or it was pick pocketed out of my bag a few days later so I’ll need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Very well mad bag
customer_reviews.text: I love how well made this bag is. I am able to fit everything I need in it! And it does not disappoint on the odor neutralization. The moment you close it you can't smell a thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever invented!! Really can't smell anything. Maybe just maybe you'll sell a scent if you put your nose to it and take a hard sniff but other than that you can't smell a thing. Had about 28 grams of weed and not a scent
customer_reviews.author: Kevin llerena

customer_reviews.title: Durable Stash Bag
customer_reviews.text: Holds a good amount of goodies. Easy to use and fits in my crossbody purse. I think this is durable material and can mask the smell of the goodness.
customer_reviews.author: .Nikki R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands of smell proof bags and this seems to be the best.
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: NO SMELL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I’ve ever bought now I can be more relaxed on not having my bag smell like straight dank I love this thing so much I can just carry this bag itself anywhere and not have to worry about anything. this is totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: First one lasted 2 years before its smell blocking started to fade. Ordered another one because the first one worked so well. That one has been going strong over a year. It completely stops some seriously strong smells. Great durability as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rawson

customer_reviews.title: Works well!! I've had t for almost a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well!! I've had t for almost a year and it still works. Haven't put it in the dryer yet bc I haven't needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Nabo

customer_reviews.title: Limited lifetime
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses where it was moderately functional, it began to reak so I put this in the dryer. Not only did the stink remain, but the interior of this bag broke down after going into the dryer. Also, the bag still smells.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Designed to break
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of use it is almost broken apart. It started with the opening tearing off and now the Velcro is coming apart. This thing is very difficult to pry open so its easy to tear. This this worked exactly as intended at first. I would often keep it in my car and would never smell a peep out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a little bigger but great smell protection and nice tight seal
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose well. It's seems to be holding up to use, and is definitely smell proof. Nice and big too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nieski

customer_reviews.title: Quality holds up. Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: The pull tab on the second Velcro thing gets caught in the Velcro, effectively destroying it. Bag is great. No herb gets caught in the outer threading as well as no smell gets out. It holds a 12oz mason jar; one dugout 3”x2”; one Tupperware 2”x3”X1” comfortably while still sealing inner and outer chambers. For 15$ I bought peace of mind as well as a fresh smelling car.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Piatt

customer_reviews.title: 100% smell proof
customer_reviews.text: This bag was amazing for all my herbs and spices, no one was able to ever smell what u had inside, unfortunately I was only able to enjoy it for 2 weeks after receiving it, because my car got stolen with it inside
customer_reviews.author: Jacob cantu

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to work! I haven’t had it for a very long time but it does the job for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very skeptical after purchasing just because I did not believe in a "smell proof bag" that Velcro shut but I was wrong. This bag is heavy duty and works like a charm. You cant smell "anything" you put inside....
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: You’ll Get Addicted
customer_reviews.text: It does its job perfectly! For transportation, I only use this brand. And, I recently bought another style for the convenience at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! I bought one for myself and had to get another for a friend. I highly recommend these if you are carrying smelly things. Didn't finish a cigar? Put it in a Ziploc will still smell up a friends car. Put the Ziploc in this bag and it won't smell. No one complains, everyone's happy. I will definitely be getting more of these.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas reisinger

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Super terrific item. I showed my friends and they went out immediately and bought some.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lawson

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY 125% as good as stated. Top brand. Only brand I will use, and that was decided thru trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Tis a nice bag. My only complaint is it doesn't have compartments for items to keep it seperate. Unsure about the velcro enclosure.
customer_reviews.author: Jess M

customer_reviews.title: Worthy purchase.  Can't smell a thing
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. I farted in the bag closed it and you couldn't smell a thing. A+ by me! lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking. Will order more, including larger, if they pass the dog sniff tests
customer_reviews.author: Total Results

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product was great for its intended purchase. I went on a family vacation and had to hide my medication. There was absolutely no odor leakage at all. Very durable. Would recommend to anyone needing to hide their medication smell.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: Good high quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Huge! Fits literally every item you could imagine. The size lets it contort to whatever awkward shaped device you throw at it. Most importantly, 0 Smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jayremy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works
customer_reviews.text: This definitely works and works well it is loud when you open it because it’s Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Agbabygirl

customer_reviews.title: must have
customer_reviews.text: ive had this for almost a month and i love it have it packed to the brim with stuff and theres no smell but cant say the same for the outside of the bag so do yourself the favor and dont smoke by it cause the outside will smell
customer_reviews.author: Travis Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Inner velcro detached from bag after a couple months. Still usable and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Smith

customer_reviews.text: Got through airport security with wax pens and herb!! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carrying your candies
customer_reviews.text: I had some candies that I carried in my carry on that I did not want to spoil. No problems in the airports keeping them fresh
customer_reviews.author: Bob K

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Wow, you really can’t smell it. That’s what she said.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time i used it
customer_reviews.text: the pull tab on the second velcro layer broke the first time i used it. very disappointed in the build quality.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: No stink!
customer_reviews.text: So far this product works extremely well. I have tested it out with some stinky stuff and once it is all sealed up nothing can be smelt from the human nose. I have not yet had to wash the product to 'reset' the carbon, but I will update this once I have done that.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good bag. It did rip though
customer_reviews.text: This is a good smell proof bag while it lasts. I've had mine for a year and a half. Only have had issues with it for the last few months. I am repurchasing because I like it that much. But I will be very careful how I open it this time as the lining ripped and it is no longer smell proof.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Fleet

customer_reviews.title: It’s just like any other product with Velcro
customer_reviews.text: Can’t smell a thing using this bag. I saw other reviews that mentioned the double Velcro made it loud and suspicious, but I don’t have a problem with it. It’s just like any other product with Velcro
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice in keeping the smell contained and the portability of the bag. Just grab and go.
customer_reviews.text: The smell proof bag is very nice in keeping the surrounding area nice and fresh smelling. The material on the outside is very durable and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: B Douglas

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got the product the tab ripped off!! So disappointed how am I supposed to open this now not worth 20$
customer_reviews.author: Anijah Wadud

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super great for transporting anything with a strong odor. I would recommend it for travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This makes me feel like a fragrance free thief in the night
customer_reviews.author: Karsen weems

customer_reviews.title: Let me be another review assuring you the bag really ...
customer_reviews.text: Let me be another review assuring you the bag really is smell-proof!! there is a bit of a design flaw, as mentioned in other reviews, and the inside tab sort of frays because of the velcro. Sort of a non-issue though I'm still ordering another
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Zip It!
customer_reviews.text: Another gift I got for a friend and he hasn't stopped using this since I got it for him! It really seals in any scents and the Velcro is very strong and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: SciFiGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Smellproof!!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product that absolutely hides the smell of your herbs. I keep my vaporizer in there too. A real life saver if you’re seeking discretion
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Leva

customer_reviews.title: Smell proof for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Velcro has already started to rip out. Might be better off with a container if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Tun@

customer_reviews.title: Great bag from a great seller!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It works perfectly to keep smells contained. Also can't speak highly enough about the seller Protective Cases! I had a slight issue and they were fast to get back in touch with me and correct the issue. If you want a quality bag from a quality seller this is it!
customer_reviews.author: P. Flowe

customer_reviews.title: These bags are the best, I have 4 of them.
customer_reviews.text: They seem like they will last for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Really works well. No smell. I tested it in drawers, secluded rooms and the car. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well-odor proof and good size for storing various items

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Legit product. Very nice. I keep a loaded dry-leaf vaporizer in it and it works like a charm!

customer_reviews.title: perfect! :)
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect!!! works great!! I leave it on my car on hot days and boom nothing! thank you!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick. Peace of mind when I'm riding with that flame!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great odor proof bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Never leaks any odors and keeps the stuff fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Zeyad Alsaeed

customer_reviews.title: yep, smellproof . . .
customer_reviews.text: very nice, and smell proof as best i can tell

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Completely smell proof! Has come in handy on many trips.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing to hide smell
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this, had it for over a year now!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Clark

customer_reviews.title: 100% works, zero smell leakage whatsoever. Came here ...
customer_reviews.text: 100% works, zero smell leakage whatsoever. Came here to buy a second and thought it would only be fair to leave a review while I was at it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it so far. Velcro on the inside has separated, but still works
customer_reviews.author: BillyGoat66

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Good quality and really works. Fast delivery. Very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Broken on first use
customer_reviews.text: First pull on the inner ring and it broke off. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Anita F

customer_reviews.title: Best smell proof item
customer_reviews.text: Best smell proof item I've ever bought or seen! Recommend this to anyone who wants to keep the smell hidden! Will be buying more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not completely smell proof
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty product, good design, but definitely not smell proof
customer_reviews.author: kev

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Does as advertised, discreet. Amazons customer service as always is the best in the industry.
customer_reviews.author: sean reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Stomp out the stink
customer_reviews.text: They do exactly what I needed them too! I recommend indeed.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bag is awesome no smell escapes the seal. Wish I bought a long time ago
customer_reviews.author: Ciairah M.

customer_reviews.title: This bag is a decent size (was not expecting it ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a decent size (was not expecting it to be so big) keeps the smell in and it’s discreet 😉😉😉
customer_reviews.author: Karen Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing! It keeps all the smell in the bag as promised. I would definitely recommend buying one of these... I got 2 :)
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I've put multiple things in the bag just to see ...
customer_reviews.text: I've put multiple things in the bag just to see how smell proof it is. I can't smell anything in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Terry Bourn

customer_reviews.title: Now you smell it, Now you Don't!! It's Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is Bomb! No smell comes out until you open it! Double layer Velcro seal openings are not silent, so don't expect to be quiet with this thing. Outer tabs are pretty strong, inner tabs are kinda silly ribbons, not sure how long they will last. (as other reviews have stated) You can fit a lot of stuff in this bad boy too, it's pretty roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: It's basically disposable.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Seams started to unthread after opening and closing with light use.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: But this works pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: The velcro on this badboy is crazy!! I will say it is not 100% smellproof. But this works pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I HIGHLY recommend this for anyone trying to keep the smell discreet. This bag is everything I was looking for and needed. However, I would knocked off a star because one of the string's inside came lose. No problem. But the string completely came out at least four and a half months later. Maybe due to to fact that I pulled too hard? I'm not sure, but I really don't mind buying one again as I gotten a ton of usage of my first one.
customer_reviews.author: April L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never have to worry about smelling loud! This bag is designed really well and holds more than you'd think.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: 100% smell proof. You can also put a lot of stuff in it too. Definitely will be recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Hands down fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want your herb to smell then purchase this bag! Must buy. Hands down fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing. Enough said. Do not hesitate or send your money elsewhere. This gets the job done greatly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great holds lots of stuff for your daily needs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! Have and will purchase again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: No smells pass through the bag whatsoever, does exactly as it says!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua McKeon

customer_reviews.title: Unstunk yay!!
customer_reviews.text: Really works to keep smelly things - quiet lol. I don't know if it works for animals, but for humans, yes it works.
customer_reviews.author: Violetness

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag! Does exactly what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: D Barr

customer_reviews.title: I filled it with durian and let it sit out ...
customer_reviews.text: I filled it with durian and let it sit out in the Texas heat for a week. I give it the stamp of approval. You can put your durian in it too!
customer_reviews.author: Bitcoin Zeitgeist

customer_reviews.title: Better products out there like Vatra Double Decker Smell Proof ...
customer_reviews.text: Too fussy, velcro is too much and you have to go through some renewal process with it periodically. Better products out there like Vatra Double Decker Smell Proof Case.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Folender

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: You can fit quite a lot in this bag without it smelling. The more you put in it the more often you have to reactivate it. Be careful if deactivating with a hairdryer though. If it gets too hot it can melt the charcoal fibers. Overall great product and can't wait to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Been using it regularly for a month now and no smell escapes. I can see the concerns for stitching falling out but simply open the bag slowly and cautiously and it works fine with no tearing. Even the items I place in the bag come out smelling better/ less pungent than usual. Slim and very portable, but has plenty of room inside.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: It holds more than I was expecting it to. Excellent material. The seal is double Velcro so it's noisy to open, but that's the closest thing I can think of to a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: schmidtyfro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Smell Proofing!
customer_reviews.text: One pricey bag but you will be surprised how much stinky stank you can put in this clean bag definitely worth the price can't beat this bag 100% smell proof love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag is the real deal. I've been dealing ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the real deal. I've been dealing with loud smelling bags for a while so i know. 5 stars hands down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to even open it up. I knew this would not work for me. I found another one with a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyberg

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly as described, keeps odors in. A+ ...
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as described, keeps odors in. A+, don't forget to use the hair dryer to reactivate the carbon technology.
customer_reviews.author: tamika atkinson

customer_reviews.title: In another review it looks like there was a ripped up string
customer_reviews.text: I don't smoke herb in my car, but sometimes drive with it. Even in the trunk it sometimes would stink up my car. This has completely eliminated that. In another review it looks like there was a ripped up string. Mine did not have this (I got the black and blue one) and it's just a little loop. So looks like they replaced that design with something that doesn't get ripped up? Def would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
